item.title: 美国银行集团将以最高10亿美元收购金融服务公司BTIG
item.description: 美国银行集团周二宣布，将以最高10亿美元的价格收购金融服务公司BTIG，此举旨在增强该银行在资本市场的业务布局。【原文：U.S. Bancorp said on Tuesday it would buy financial services firm BTIG in a deal worth up to $1 billion, as the lender looks to strengthen its capital markets presence.】

item.title: 最新融资轮中估值达10亿美元的国防独角兽企业
item.description: 国防独角兽公司（Defense Unicorns）周二宣布完成1.36亿美元B轮融资，该公司是美国战争部的软件供应商，此轮融资使其估值突破10亿美元。【原文：Defense Unicorns, which is a software provider to the U.S. Department of War, said on Tuesday it has completed a Series B funding round worth $136 million, bringing its valuation to over $1 billion.】

item.title: 量子软件公司Haiqu完成1100万美元融资
item.description: 初创量子软件公司Haiqu宣布完成1100万美元融资，本轮融资由Primary Venture Partners领投。参与Haiqu融资的其他投资者包括丰田创投、MacVenture Capital、Qudit Investments和Silicon Roundabout Ventures。【原文：Haiqu, a start-up quantum software company, said it had raised $11 million in a fund-raising round led by Primary Venture Partners. Other investors involved in Haiqu's fund-raising included Toyota Ventures, MacVenture Capital, Qudit Investments and Silicon Roundabout Ventures.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称《老大哥》制作方Banijay正与All3Media所有者洽谈合并电视制作部门
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，拥有《老大哥》节目的法国媒体公司Banijay集团正与All3Media母公司RedBird IMI商讨合并双方电视制作业务事宜。【原文：Banijay Group , the French media company that owns "Big Brother," is in talks with All3Media-owner RedBird IMI about merging their TV production businesses, two people familiar with the situation told Reuters.】

item.title: EquipmentShare.com计划在美国IPO中实现逾60亿美元估值
item.description: 建筑科技公司EquipmentShare.com周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中目标估值高达64.1亿美元，这可能为今年强劲的上市行情定下基调。【原文：Construction tech firm EquipmentShare.com said on Tuesday it was targeting a ​valuation of up to $6.41 billion in its U.S. ‌initial public offering, potentially setting the tone for a strong year of listings.】

item.title: 早间竞价：通胀考验聚焦美联储分歧
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 摩根大通利润下滑，因其为苹果信用卡合作协议建立储备金
item.description: 摩根大通第四季度利润下滑，因其与高盛达成协议，接手与苹果的信用卡合作项目，产生了一次性费用。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's profit fell in the fourth quarter as it took a one-time charge tied to its agreement with Goldman Sachs to take over a credit ​card partnership with Apple.】

item.title: 达美航空预测高端旅行需求将推动盈利增长，并订购波音787客机
item.description: 达美航空周二预测2026年盈利将增长约20%，理由是消费者和企业需求强劲，高端旅行销售额上升。该公司表示已同意购买30架波音787-10飞机以增强其远程机队。【原文：Delta Air Lines forecast about 20% earnings growth in 2026 on Tuesday, citing strong consumer and corporate demand and rising sales of premium travel, and ​said it has agreed to buy 30 Boeing 787-10 planes to strengthen its long-haul fleet.】

item.title: 纽约联邦银行第四季度利润激增，上调盈利目标
item.description: 纽约联邦银行周二公布第四季度利润增长，并上调了关键盈利指标的目标值。此举得益于利率上升以及股市上涨推动客户资产价值激增。【原文：BNY reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday and raised the target for a key profitability measure, helped by higher interest ​rates and a surge in the value of its client assets ‌amid rallying equity markets.】

item.title: 欧盟与南共市达成贸易协定，凸显特朗普在拉美强硬外交的局限性
item.description: 欧盟与南美最大经济体历经25年谈判后达成的重大贸易协议，可能预示着特朗普政府在该地区施压策略的局限性，官员和分析师表示。【原文：A mega trade deal clinched between the European Union and South America’s biggest economies after a quarter-century of talks may signal the limits of the Trump administration’s pressure tactics in the region, officials and analysts said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯驳斥特朗普关于委内瑞拉石油的言论
item.description: 莫斯科周二表示，俄罗斯在委内瑞拉开发的石油资产归俄罗斯所有，俄方将继续在该国开展工作。此前美国总统特朗普宣称对这个南美国家拥有控制权。【原文：Oil assets that Russia develops in Venezuela belong to Russia, which will continue working there, Moscow said on Tuesday, after U.S. President Donald Trump's claims of control over the South American country.】

item.title: 波兰电力系统去年12月遭遇大规模网络攻击未遂，部长称
item.description: 波兰能源部长周二表示，该国电力系统在去年12月最后一周遭遇了近年来最大规模的网络攻击，且此次攻击模式与以往不同。【原文：Poland's power system faced its largest cyberattack in years in the last week of December that also followed a different pattern, the country's energy minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 五角大楼将向L3Harris火箭发动机业务投资10亿美元
item.description: 美国政府将向L3Harris Technologies公司的火箭发动机业务投资10亿美元，以确保为"战斧"巡航导弹和"爱国者"拦截导弹等各类导弹提供急需的发动机稳定供应。【原文：The U.S. government will invest $1 billion in L3Harris Technologies' rocket motor business, guaranteeing a steady supply of the much-needed motors used in a wide range of missiles such as Tomahawks and Patriot interceptors.】

item.title: 特朗普最新针对美联储的举措可能触发了导火索，鲍威尔背后正形成一股支持浪潮。
item.description: 在多年抨击美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔后，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普对这位72岁的前投资银行家发起刑事调查，此举可能已触发危险信号。共和党议员和前高级政策制定者纷纷站队鲍威尔，而市场也发出警示：若总统动摇全球最重要中央银行的独立性，恐将引发强烈反弹。【原文：After years of berating Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, President Donald Trump may have hit a tripwire in launching a criminal probe of the 72-year-old former investment banker, with Republican lawmakers and former top policymakers rallying ​to Powell's side and markets hinting at potential blowback if the president undermines the independence of the world's most important central bank.】

item.title: 华尔街期货下跌，摩根大通财报与通胀数据即将公布
item.description: 美国股市期货周二小幅下挫，投资者正等待关键通胀数据以获取利率路径的线索，同时摩根大通即将公布的第四季度财报将拉开财报季序幕。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped on Tuesday, as investors awaited ‌crucial inflation data for clues on the interest rate trajectory, and fourth-quarter results from JPMorgan Chase that would mark the start of the earnings season.】

item.title: 特朗普对伊朗加征关税的威胁可能重启中美裂痕
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普威胁对与伊朗有贸易往来的国家征收25%的关税。【原文：Donald Trump threatened to slap a 25% tariff on countries that trade with Iran.】

item.title: 日本投资者在12月抛售海外资产
item.description: 日本投资者12月成为外国债务的净卖方，因美国国债收益率上升；同时抛售外国股票，因高企的股价估值引发获利了结。【原文：Japanese investors were net sellers of foreign debt in December with U.S. Treasury yields rising, and also sold foreign equities as elevated stock valuations prompted profit-taking.】

item.title: 全球央行行长力挺美联储主席鲍威尔，此前特朗普曾对其发出威胁
item.description: "我们完全支持美联储及其主席杰罗姆·H·鲍威尔，"欧洲央行、英国央行及其他九家机构的负责人表示。【原文："We stand in full solidarity with the Federal ‍Reserve System and its Chair Jerome H. Powell," the heads of the ⁠European Central Bank, the ‍Bank of England and nine other institutions ‌said.】

item.title: 贝莱德最新裁员计划将削减约250个岗位
item.description: 全球最大资产管理公司贝莱德将裁减数百个岗位，作为定期裁员计划的一部分以提升效率，该公司发言人向路透社透露。【原文：BlackRock , the world's largest asset manager, will cut hundreds of jobs as part of a regular round of layoffs to improve efficiency, a spokesperson for the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 雷诺将于3月起在韩国销售基于吉利平台的Filante SUV
item.description: 雷诺周二宣布，其新款Filante车型将于3月起在韩国上市销售，并计划于2027年初前在拉丁美洲及海湾国家推出。【原文：Renault will sell its new Filante car in South Korea from March before launching sales in Latin American and Gulf countries by early 2027, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球央行行长计划发表声明支持美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 两名消息人士称，全球央行官员正计划发表一份协调声明，以支持美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔。此前特朗普政府曾威胁要对他提起刑事指控。【原文：Global central bank officials are planning to release a coordinated statement of support for U.S. ​Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell after ‌the Trump administration threatened him with a criminal indictment, two sources said.】

item.title: 日经亚洲报道：谷歌将在越南开发、制造高端智能手机
item.description: 日经亚洲周二援引知情人士消息报道，谷歌将于今年在越南启动高端智能手机的研发与制造业务。【原文：Google will start developing and manufacturing high-end smartphones in Vietnam this year, Nikkei Asia reported on Tuesday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Global central banks work on statement in solidarity with Fed's Powell, Bloomberg News reports
item.description: Global central bank officials are working on a statement to express support for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell after the Trump administration opened a criminal investigation into him, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.

item.title: Indian cloud firm Amagi bets on tech shift in media industry for growth
item.description: General Atlantic-backed Indian cloud software player Amagi Media Labs is banking on media customers moving to the cloud to boost revenue, the company's chief executive said.

item.title: Malaysia to take legal action against X over Grok AI concerns
item.description: Malaysia's communications regulator said on Tuesday it will take legal action against social media platform X due to concerns over user safety in relation to artificial intelligence feature Grok.

item.title: 奥斯特德股价飙升，因美国法院撤销特朗普对海上风电项目的禁令
item.description: 丹麦海上风电开发商奥斯特德公司股价周二飙升5.1%，此前美国法院批准该公司重启其近乎完工的"革命风电"项目，缓解了市场对其可能遭受巨额财务损失的担忧。【原文：Shares of Danish offshore wind developer ​Orsted jumped 5.1% on ‌Tuesday after a U.S. court cleared the company to resume work on its ‌nearly completed Revolution Wind project, ​easing fears of massive financial losses.】

item.title: 贝莱德称投资者在2026年人工智能押注中更青睐能源供应商而非科技巨头
item.description: 全球最大资产管理公司贝莱德周二表示，尽管仍看好未来一年人工智能领域的投资前景，但将把重点转向更广泛的机遇。【原文：BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, still believes in the investment case for artificial intelligence in the year ahead but will be focusing on broader opportunities, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的越南特使将目光投向贸易逆差，因河内对美顺差已超越中国
item.description: 特朗普政府计划任命一位致力于解决"不平衡"贸易关系的候选人接替美国驻越南大使。在与华盛顿陷入未决关税谈判期间，近几个季度越南对美商品贸易顺差已超越中国。【原文：The Trump administration plans to replace the U.S. ambassador to Vietnam with a nominee set on addressing "imbalanced" trade relations, as Hanoi's goods trade surplus with Washington surpassed China's in recent quarters while it was locked in unresolved tariff negotiations with Washington.】

item.title: 英国Trustpilot公司预计年收入将增长20%，得益于预订量提升。
item.description: 全球在线评论平台Trustpilot周二预测，2025年营收和利润将实现超预期增长，增幅达20%，这得益于其所有市场订单量均实现两位数增长。【原文：Global online review platform Trustpilot forecast 20% growth in revenue and profit ahead of expectations for 2025 on Tuesday, helped by double-digit growth in bookings in all its markets.】

item.title: Lindt的年度销售额略高于预期
item.description: 瑞士巧克力制造商连德（Lindt & Sprüngli）周二表示，2025年其销售额实现12.4%的有机增长，这得益于其将上涨的可可豆价格转嫁给消费者，该业绩略高于市场预期。【原文：Swiss chocolate maker Lindt & Spruengli said on Tuesday its sales grew 12.4% organically in 2025, driven by higher cocoa prices that it passed through to customers, and slightly beat market expectations.】
